page.title: 04What the houses are made of
page.content: Some of the older houses in our area are made of cob which is a mix of straw mud and dung. Cob houses need a thatched roof with a very wide brim covering some of the house and it needs a wide strip at the bottom of tar. People made cob houses in the olden days because it was the only materials they had. At the same time but in a different area we had stone. (Our school is made of stone.) other materials for building a house is brick which is usually cemented over the top then painted. Another material is breeze block which is only about 50 years old. Most of the older houses in our area are made of stone.
